p: Degradome sequencing generated over 676.58 million raw reads from the eight degradome libraries (Supplementary Table S2). For each degradome library, the number of reads aligned to mRNA transcripts ranged from 146,426 to 167,119. Degradome signatures consistent with miRNA-guided cleavage events within the mRNA transcripts were analysed. A total of 218,179 and 222,077 miRNA-guided target sites were identified in the flag leaf and developing grain libraries, respectively (Supplementary Tables S13 & S14). Degradomics data, with pairing information (paired and unpaired sites, miRNA-mRNA complementary sequence) between durum miRNAs and their targets, is listed in Supplementary Tables S13 and S14.
